meta_description.title: Secret of Mana - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: Secret of Mana, originally released in Japan as Seiken Densetsu 2, is a 1993 action role-playing game developed and published by Square (now Square Enix) ...Genre(s): Action role-playingDirector(s): Koichi IshiiArtist(s): Shinichi Kameoka; Hiroo Isono‎Programmer(s): Nasir Gebelli‎Gameplay · ‎Plot · ‎Development · ‎Reception and legacy

people_also_ask.heading: Secret of Mana is a pretty easy game. Once you have all the characters, just make a point of spening a little time maxing out your magic levels every time you get it upgraded.17-Nov-2003
people_also_ask.title: Is Secret of Mana hard? - Ars Technica OpenForum

people_also_ask.heading: In 1991, Square reused the Seiken Densetsu trademark for an unrelated Game Boy action role-playing game directed by Koichi Ishii....History.
people_also_ask.title: Mana (series) - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.heading: about 22½ Hours
people_also_ask.heading2: When focusing on the main objectives, Secret of Mana is about 22½ Hours in length. If you're a gamer that strives to see all aspects of the game, you are likely to spend around 35½ Hours to obtain 100% completion.
people_also_ask.title: How long is Secret of Mana? | HowLongToBeat

people_also_ask.heading: Originally released in 1993, "Secret of Mana" is by far the most popular title in the “Mana” series. Now it's finally getting a long-awaited, full 3D remake! The game faithfully retells the beloved story while adopting modern 3D graphics and controls.
